ResponseRules.description: Alfred Rose. Alfred is trying to wrap his head around what's going on. He's tired, worn down, and the presence of aliens (especially the Weaver) outside the window is creeping him out. He also is more disappointed when he finds out he didn't spot Quentin's smuggling operation, which makes him wonder if he's fit for duty (and re-evaluating his life choices in the short time he has left).

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose Guard Duty Bark
ResponseRule.description: He is standing guard in the Cargo Bay. Just beyond the doors and windows there are unimaginable horrors stalking about, so tension is very high. The guards here have witnessed a great deal of death and chaos in the last few hours.

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose Smuggler Warning (Transcribe)
ResponseRule.description: Sarah tells him to be aware of a smuggling operation on board the space station. A group is stealing high-value technology and smuggling it off Talos for sale on the black markets on Earth. Alfred is on assignment to investigate this ring and report findings back to Sarah. The helmet he refers to is out-of-the question for his position and rumor says they allow use of psycic powers or something.

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose: OnUse, All Aliens Dead
ResponseRule.description: Security guards have been trapped by a swarm of aliens and holding out for a miracle, and Morgan has delivered it to them. Morgan made turrets that, combined with the security small-arms fire, wiped out the attacking aliens in this section. But the battle was costly

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose: Loiter, Ready for Combat
ResponseRule.description: Security is bracing for an imminent battle with alien forces. They have been holed up in a safe place, but the time has come to fight the aliens

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose Smuggler Ring In Progress
ResponseRule.description: He was investigating a smuggling operation on board the space station. A group is stealing high-value technology and smuggling it off Talos for sale on the black markets on Earth. Alfred is on assignment to investigate this ring and report findings back to Sarah. Only now he lears, after-the-fact, that one of the ring leaders was working right under his nose the whole time. (The smuggler is dead now)

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose and Sam Hertz Watch the Weaver
ResponseRule.description: Alfred Rose and Sam Hertz stand guard at a window and watch the bizzare alien ecology unfold in the chamber next to them. Tension is very high with the aliens being so close, but at the moment they are safe behind thier protective bulkhead and shatterproof glass. They just saw someone they know raised from a corpse to become an alien

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose: Talks to Ekaterina 1
ResponseRule.description: The Chief of Security, Sarah Elazar, died in combat with the aliens. Even though the security forces won they mourn her death. She enabled them to survive this far.

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose: Talks to Ekaterina 2
ResponseRule.description: The Chief of Security, Sarah Elazar, died in combat with the aliens. Even though the security forces won they mourn her death. She enabled them to survive this far.

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose: Talks to Ekaterina 3
ResponseRule.description: The Chief of Security, Sarah Elazar, died in combat with the aliens. Even though the security forces won they mourn her death. She enabled them to survive this far.

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose: OnUsed, All Aliens Dead
ResponseRule.description: Security guards have been trapped by a swarm of aliens and holding out for a miracle, and Morgan has delivered it to them. Morgan made turrets that, combined with the security small-arms fire, wiped out the attacking aliens in this section. But the battle was costly

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose: Player Futz with Door
ResponseRule.description: Player messes with a door that will flood the compartment with aliens if opened.

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose: Mourning Sarah
ResponseRule.description: The Chief of Security, Sarah Elazar, died in combat with the aliens. Even though the security forces won they mourn her death. She enabled them to survive this far.

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose: Mourning Darcy Maddox
ResponseRule.description: Mourning a fallen Security Officer

ResponseRule.description: Mourning a fallen Security Officer

ResponseRule.name: Alfred Rose Smuggler Ring Complete
ResponseRule.description: He was investigating a smuggling operation on board the space station. A group is stealing high-value technology and smuggling it off Talos for sale on the black markets on Earth. Alfred is on assignment to investigate this ring and report findings back to Sarah. Only now he lears, after-the-fact, that one of the ring leaders was working right under his nose the whole time. (The smuggler is dead now)
